rows.label: qev025801_MSG0001
rows.name:
For what possible reason must I believe in in in an
invisible existence simply to receive some water?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0002
rows.name:
Blasphemy! You would openly mock our Bringer of
Miracles?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0003
rows.name:
Er, I don't rightly see how I can mock something that
does not exist?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0004
rows.name:
I'm asking for just a little of the water everyone else
here is drinking, okay? One sip and I'll be on my way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0005
rows.name:
Such presumption! And yet even still, our god decrees
that his miraculous water be shared with you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0006
rows.name:
If you refuse to join our faith, the cost will be two
assassin springtails.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0007
rows.name:
Out of the question, yes? Now stop this stubborn
selfishness and and and let me take the water I need.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0008
rows.name:
I tend a large flock of Ma-non, but never once have I
met someone so rude as you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0009
rows.name:
...Malyteth, please remove this unbeliever from the
premises.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0010
rows.name:
I'm sorry, but but I must ask you to leave, yes?
Only those who believe in the Bringer of Miracles are
welcome in in in our church, you understand?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0011
rows.name:
You seem incapable of such faith, don't you?
As as as a fellow Ma-non, I pity you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0012
rows.name: ...Did you catch all that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0013
rows.name:
Do you buy into all the invisible god nonsense that
woman was talking about?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_JNK0010
rows.name: Believe

rows.label: qev025801_SEL0011
rows.name: Explain that you feel the Bringer of Miracles' presence.

rows.label: qev025801_JNK0020
rows.name: Disbelieve

rows.label: qev025801_SEL0021
rows.name: Dismiss it all as superstitious hooey.

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0014
rows.name:
It, um, doesn't especially surprise me to hear that from
a human. You all seem to be inclined to religious
beliefs, don't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0015
rows.name:
But for science-minded pursuers of empirical truth
like the Ma-non to buy into it is strange, right?
Yes. Quite quite strange.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0016
rows.name:
However, a recent outbreak left many Ma-non ill, you
see? Those who drank water from this church are said
to have recovered—hence the uptick in belief, perhaps?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0017
rows.name:
You are a rational human, aren't you?
It seems we share the same opinion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0018
rows.name:
But I fear rumor has spread that the water from this
church can cure the disease presently sweeping the
Ma-non community. This has led many to believe, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0019
rows.name: I will be candid with you, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0020
rows.name:
I suspect this group caused the outbreak intentionally,
perhaps as a means of recruiting more members?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0021
rows.name:
If my hypothesis is correct, I am duty-bound as a
physician to take action, aren't I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0022
rows.name:
If I could just acquire a sample of this "miracle water,"
I can analyze its contents and expose their plot, can't I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0023
rows.name:
Do you find this cult suspicious as well, maybe?
Will you join me in unmasking Fraisie as a fraud?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0024
rows.name:
Then you must first help me by finding the two assassin
springtails she asks for, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0025
rows.name:
Meanwhile, I will go investigate the Biahno water-
purification plant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0026
rows.name:
The first cases of Ma-non falling ill occurred just after
that plant was completed, you see? Therefore there must
be some connection, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0027
rows.name:
The assassin springtail is as dangerous as the name
implies, yes? The poison it bears is extremely potent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0028
rows.name:
Whatever purpose those women have for them,
it it it probably isn't good?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0029
rows.name:
...Still, I see no other way, so please find them for me.
We'll speak again once I've investigated the water at
Biahno Lake, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0030
rows.name:
Phew... What what what in the name of science WERE
those creatures?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0031
rows.name:
I was on my way to Biahno Lake when a pack of them
forced me to turn tail and run back here. This planet is
certainly generous with ways to die violently, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_JNK0030
rows.name: Warn

rows.label: qev025801_SEL0031
rows.name:
Tell Staccata that it's not safe
to wander around unescorted.

rows.label: qev025801_JNK0040
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev025801_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Staccata if he was hurt.

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0032
rows.name:
I see that now, don't I? I've been safely sequestered
inside the walls of New LA all this time and never
knew, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0033
rows.name:
A few bumps from occasionally stumbling, but worry
not—Dr. Staccata has treated far worse, haven't I?
I'll have myself patched up in no time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0034
rows.name:
That's my report—what about you? Were you able to
track down those assassin springtails?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0035
rows.name:
How astonishing! Thank you so so much.
You BLADEs never fail to impress, do you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0036
rows.name:
...All right, Fraisie, a deal is a deal, isn't it?
Let's have some of your miracle water.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0037
rows.name:
Hmm. I never expected you to actually track down
two assassin springtails.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0038
rows.name:
Very well. As you say, I made a promise—I shall
stand by it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0039
rows.name:
Now I assume you have no further business here?
Then I must ask that a brutish unbeliever like yourself
never return to our church. Good day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0040
rows.name:
So this is their miracle water then? I must say,
it looks just like every other water I have experienced.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0041
rows.name: *slurp* I see, yes? This tastes just like...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0042
rows.name:
Still, I need to analyze it more closely before I can
be certain of anything, don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0043
rows.name:
I'd like to ask you to visit the Biahno Lake water-
purification plant and see if anything seems amiss.
Er, if that is okay with you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0044
rows.name:
If we can gather one more piece of evidence from there
to tie to this case, we'll maybe be be be able to
pin Fraisie down?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025801_MSG0045
rows.name: Let's meet back here once we're done, okay?[ST:wait ]
